name: Pikmin 251
description:
Pikmin 251 is a fangame based on Pikmin 2, and was created by PikHacker in 2019. It is a full hack of said game, and has many additions while also expanding on the old elements of Pikmin 2.

Differences from Pikmin 2:
-> Orange Pikmin are introduced, which are explosion-resistant Pikmin that are scarcely found in caves, and cannot leave.
->All areas now have different maps and names (with the exception of the Wistful Wild).
-> There is now a total count of 252 treasures. See List of treasures introduced in Pikmin 251 to see all of the new treasures.
